writer.name: 杰森·布鲁克斯 Jason Brooks

this_title: Voice of a Nation: My Journey Through Afghanistan
trans_title: 一个民族的声音：我在阿富汗的旅途
introduction: Jawed Taiman takes a distinct look at Afghanistan and lets the Afghan people have their say. En route through the different provinces, through urban and rural regions, in discussion with intellectuals and simple folk, politicians and Taliban fighters a multifaceted picture emerges of a country that is often portrayed as incomprehensible.
chinese_title: 一个民族的声音：我在阿富汗的旅途
foreign_title: Voice of a Nation: My Journey Through Afghanistan
